TopicTitle: Every thing you ever wanted to know about the Shuttles systems but were afraid to ask

Articles.Content:
Figure id post this so every one can know about it

http://ocw.mit.edu/courses/aeronautics-and-astronautics/16-885j-aircraft-systems-engineering-fall-2005/index.htm

Every thing you ever wanted to know about the design of the Shuttle

covers pretty much every thing right from the guys that designed each sub systems if you havent watch it you should

great insight on how some thing like that gets built and some good lessons on how you can do stuff in KSP
cool but it will be hard to make stock

i have got pretty close but yes i need to use some mod parts but i have working shuttle looking thing lol

looks like the Shuttle and Buran had kid lol
